original_text: As I live, saith the King, whose name is the Lord of hosts, Surely as Tabor is among the mountains, and as Carmel by the sea, so shall he come.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와라 일컫는 왕이 이르시되 나의 삶으로 맹세하노니 그가 과연 산들 중의 다볼 같이, 해변의 갈멜 같이 오리라

sentences.original_text: whose name is the Lord of hosts
Surely as Tabor is among the mountains
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 다산이 산들 중에 있는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: and as Carmel by the sea
